title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
![pelvis_chestturn.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3334010322-pelvis_chestturn.jpg)

After teleporting to Task 3 checkpoint 4, querying the pelvis orientation returns invalid value while foot orientation is updated correctly.  See attached picture trying to do a chest turn relative to pelvis orientation. It turns in direction of original orientation.
I didnt see this issue with other tasks 1,2 . So probably it is limited to  3
